comment._content: Dr. Lauro Severiano Muller, Foreign Minister of Brazil. Visited New York City in 1913.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of June 17 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=950CE7DE1730E233A... lists members of the party. Lauro Muller (see pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lauro_M%c3%bcller and en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lauro_M%c3%bcller ) is in the middle, above his name. Helio Lobo (see www.biblio.com.br/defaultz.asp?link=http://www.biblio.com... could be the younger man at the right.
